words.prompt: The _____________ of something is how much it is worth.
A _____________ is a plan or a set of rules for doing something.
If you make a _____________ of something, you write down information to save it.
If you _____________ something, you made something new.
_____________ is the dollars and cents that you use to buy things.
If something is _____________ a certain amount of money, it costs that much money to buy it.
The _____________ of things are how much you have to pay to buy them.
If you _____________ something, you pay money to buy it.
If something _____________, it made a soft crackling sound.
The _____________ of something is the line or border where it ends.
When things _____________, they grow and change.
_____________ are large numbers of plants that are grown for food.
If something _____________, it came into sight.
_____________ are steps in a process.
Something that is _____________ is bright and yellow like gold.
If something is _____________, it is giving out light.
_____________ are units for measuring time.
Something that is _____________ is very bright.
When you _____________ something, you make or invent it.
When you use your _____________, you form pictures or ideas in your mind.
Sometimes poets use _____________. They include the same line at least twice in a poem.
The poet shared her _____________ about using your imagination.
The _____________ of a poem are the syllables that make rhythm in a line of poetry.
“I’m a swan” is a _____________ because it compares two unlike things.
